page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: When I leave home ;in the morning at 8.3O I catch a{taxito school}and it takes ten minutes. The children at my school are aged{4 - ll}years. There are over 5O children in a{lOO year old {building.} When I get to school we have assembly and when that finishes we do English. Then we do Maths and in our maths we do fractions. On Tuesday in the afternoon we play football in the field. Every Monday morning we have music. On Wednesday we have a different teacher, Mr.Jones the head mistress's husband. Usually we have three lady teachers all middle aged. We have wood work nd I am making a boat and I painted it blue and it has a long sail. When school finishes at 3.3O p.m. I get a taxi home.
